attributes.action: Provide free PCR tests for teachers weekly if schools are to remain open.
attributes.additional_details: Getting this pandemic under control and showing respect to our profession for exposing ourselves and our loved ones to a deadly virus, to provide our children with an education is their duty of care.
attributes.background: PCR tests should be made available freely to all teachers in the nation if schools are to remain open. Schools are high-risk workplaces and hundreds of households mixing together can't be contributing to reducing the spread of the virus. Teachers should have the opportunity to be tested every week.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Introduce weekly Covid-19 testing for school staff and students in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550053

Open Covid-19 test sites nationwide specifically for children/parents/teachers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551444
